attributes.action: Road Safety measures - Leafy Lane, Maidstone, ME16 0QQ
attributes.additional_details:
Brunswick House Primary School

We are petitioning for the introduction of new road safety measures outside Brunswick House Primary School on Leafy Lane ME16 0QQ, before we have a fatality.

We want to enable our children and young adults from MGGS, Maplesden Noakes and Brunswick House to cross Leafy Lane safely on their way to and from school.

We want improved road safety measures such as a zebra crossing that addresses all the road safety issues outside our School.

We know that you will want to be a part of a local community coming together committed to the safety of all our children.

Together we can make a difference.
